thread.title: Anonymous
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Anonymous
text: My husband and I met with Rhoda, at the Mississauga location when we were at our wits end, with constant calls from creditors we were simply unable to pay. We felt like we were stuck, with no way out. Rhoda was able to provide us with informative information that put us at ease, and restored our ability to sleep at night. She was able to use her expertise to help us choose the correct action for our situation, taking our entire financial situation into consideration. The process was clear, simple, and quick, and she took time to ensure we understood everything. She was always reachable by phone or email if we had any questions. I would highly recommend David Sklar!
